Articles.Content:
Sorry if answered i searched and couldn't find it.

I'm looking to do a career mode with exclusively exploration contracts. 

Is there a way to minimize the clutter of contracts in mission control? 

Also, could i author my own contracts somehow?

Thanks!

Get rid of contracts you don't want: [Rejector](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/108316)

Make your own contracts: [Contract Configurator](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/101604)

> 
> Get rid of contracts you don't want: [Rejector](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/108316)
> Make your own contracts: [Contract Configurator](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/101604)

Thank you! Exactly what I was looking for!
